summary: Completed API standardization: applied BeautyApiResponse trait to all remaining vendor controllers (BeautySubscriptionController, BeautyVendorController) and added missing translation keys (data_retrieved_successfully, store_not_found, vendor_not_found, ad_position_required_for_banner_ads, duration_must_be_30_or_365_days_for_dashboard) in both English and Persian.
current_status: API standardization complete. Ready to move on to pagination/filtering enhancements and rate limiting implementation.
